name: CampaignUpdate
desc: The list of campaign fields that are updatable.

items.name: budgetAmount
items.desc: The total budget amount available to the campaign.You canʼt reduce a budgetAmount after you start a campaign. When you set a budget, your campaign runs until you exhaust your budget, pause your campaign, or reach the scheduled end date.

items.name: budgetOrders
items.desc: The budget orders that you assign to the campaign. This applies only to campaigns with a line-of-credit payment model. See Budget Orders.

items.name: countriesOrRegions
items.desc: The App Store geoterritories where you’re promoting your app. The default value is US. This field requires an ISO country code value for the locations where you’re promoting.

items.name: dailyBudgetAmount
items.desc: Your daily spend cap. If you reach the daily spend cap, your campaign pauses for the remainder of the day.

items.name: locInvoiceDetails
items.desc: The standard invoice details you can set and edit using the LOCInvoiceDetails object.

items.name: name
items.desc: The name of the campaign, which is unique within an organization.

items.name: status
items.desc: The user-controlled status to enable or pause the campaign.
